Html:
Hi,

Great library. I have been able to render some sample SVG files.

Just a quick question I can see that you have reference to animationMotion in your library. Do you support animation somehow like generating an animated GIF?

Thanks

Ajay

Hi Ajay,

I'd love to say yes but unfortuntely there is no support for animation. I had always intended to support basic animation in the form of GIF files but it's unlikely to happen anytime soon.

Cheers,
Dave
